item.title: Wendy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra
item.description: "Es natural condición de las mujeres desdeñar a quien las quiere y amar a quien las aborrece" -- Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho
